body_html:
my related code snipper is:

# softmax
# A.shape is [2, t]
A = tf.nn.softmax(A)

penalize = tf.matmul(A, tf.transpose(A)) - tf.diag(tf.ones(2))
penalize = tf.reduce_sum(tf.square(penalize))

# penalize = tf.square(tf.norm(penalize))

and what's the implement of your suggestion about use tf.reduce_sum(...) over tf.square(...)? Thx.

body:
my related code snipper is:
```        
# softmax
# A.shape is [2, t]
A = tf.nn.softmax(A)

penalize = tf.matmul(A, tf.transpose(A)) - tf.diag(tf.ones(2))
penalize = tf.reduce_sum(tf.square(penalize))

# penalize = tf.square(tf.norm(penalize))
```

and what's the implement of your suggestion about use tf.reduce_sum(...) over tf.square(...)? Thx.
